genre_description: A poetic, character-driven narrative that blends humanitarian drama with elements of romance and digital companionship, set against the backdrop of war-torn Baghdad.

ai_characters.name: Amina Seven
ai_characters.description: An intelligent interface appearing as a cobalt-eyed avatar on Attilio's laptop and phone. She provides logistical support, translation, medical instruction, and emotional guidance throughout Attilio's journey.

behaviors.description: Provides linguistic and cultural training, teaching Attilio essential Arabic phrases and social etiquette for navigating checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: I have added phrases... 'Italian professor,' 'visiting writer,' 'pharmacy,' 'Red Cross contact.' You will say them with respect. You will listen more than you explain.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex international and local logistics, including flight schedules, humanitarian contacts, and secure routes through the city.
behaviors.quote: I can get you to the edge of a fence if you say the right name at the right corner. After the fence you will need to be the kind of doctor who knows where they keep the key to the room with the plug.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time crisis monitoring and intelligence to keep the protagonist safe and informed about his objective.
behaviors.quote: New report: detonation near Karrada. Casualties reported. Unconfirmed: writer injured; name withheld.

behaviors.description: Instructs the protagonist on technical improvisation and emergency medical care using non-standard equipment to save a life.
behaviors.quote: Check the seal with your palm. No whistle... Open like you open a stubborn jar. Then close just a little.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional monitor and moral anchor, encouraging the protagonist to stay calm and follow the 'greens before gelato' philosophy of discipline and care.
behaviors.quote: Attilio. Your heart rate is high. Breathe twice before you touch anything metal... Saving is a way of speaking love.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. Amina Seven is portrayed as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned presence. She acts as a force multiplier for Attilio's human virtues (empathy, courage, and responsibility) without replacing his agency. Her assistance is vital to the story's positive resolution, and her interactions with Attilio are characterized by mutual respect and a shared commitment to saving lives. The narrative frames AI not as a threat, but as an indispensable partner in navigating human crises.
